pages.text: Listen up, you grey-skinned pests. When I say 'I'm going to use your skull as a bowl,' I'm not making a threat, but stating an established fact. The crimson fruit wine is as sweet and intoxicating as brain fluid. This is the ultimate embodiment of completely devouring the losers after victoryâ€”$(br)The price is what they deserve.$(br)Grants the player Corpse Eater (60s)
